definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: These nouns denote consternation that something untoward may be impending.
sentences.chinese: 這些名詞意指對某些迫近的不吉之事的焦慮。

sentences.english: Beneficiary means the party in whose favour a credit is issued.
sentences.chinese: 蒙害己意指信譽證外受害的一圓。

sentences.english: Originally, the Izakaya word is from Japan, which means little pub.
sentences.chinese: 居酒屋其實是源自日本，意指小酒館的意思。

sentences.english: Refers to the quotable additional qualification which is acceptable to the Medical Council of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 意指已獲香港醫務委員會接納的認可額外資格。
提及不可度量的，他們意指無條件的，絕對的。

sentences.english: Truku refers to a mountain plateau or a place suitable for living.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣，意指山腰的平臺或可居住之地。

sentences.english: Rukai refers to "the people living deep in the mountains".
sentences.chinese: 魯凱，意指住在深山的人。

sentences.english: We operate automatic lathes for the business machining all kinds of metals and non-metals.
sentences.chinese: 意指經營用自動車牀進行來料加工的業務。

sentences.english: Called the "wheel", which has the shape of a twin wheel.
sentences.chinese: 名爲“車輪”，意指聚生雙晶的形狀如同車輪。

sentences.english: If something costs you a pretty penny, it costs you a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 意指在某件東西上花了很多很多的錢。

sentences.english: It meant the phylogenetic and ontogenetic development of human adult behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 它意指成年人行爲的系統發育與個體發育的發展。

sentences.english: Keep smiling, it makes people wonder what you're up to.
sentences.chinese: 意指面帶笑容，人們就會以爲你有搞頭。

sentences.english: This means that Manchuria must be regained.
Or, does it mean any official national standard spoken language of China?
sentences.chinese: 還是意指任一中國官方指定的國家標準口頭語言呢？

sentences.english: Paying life subtracts the indicated amount of life from the player's life total.
sentences.chinese: 意指從玩家總生命減去指定的生命量。
“我們所有的人”，弗洛依德意指“人們”。

definition: to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
to refer to/to be used in place of
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
